mapper.select: select * from( select row_number() over(order by missingId desc) as missing_no, m.* from missingboard m ) m2 where m2.missing_no between #{start} and #{end}

select * from( select row_number() over(partition by location order by missingId desc) as missing_no, m.* from missingboard m ) m2 where (m2.missing_no between #{start} and #{end}) and location = #{location}
select count(*) from missingboard where location = #{location}

select * from( select row_number() over(partition by location, pet order by missingId desc) as missing_no, m.* from missingboard m ) m2 where (m2.missing_no between #{start} and #{end}) and location = #{location} and pet = #{pet}
select count(*) from missingboard where location = #{location} and pet = #{pet}
mapper.update: update missingboard set title = #{title}, location = #{location}, tel = #{tel}, pet = #{pet}, description = #{description}, gratuity = #{gratuity}, img1 = #{img1}, img2 = #{img2}, img3 = #{img3},missingDate = #{missingDate} where missingId = #{missingId}
update missingboard set rule = 1 where missingId = #{missingId}
